# Charlie Hulcher

> Engineering leader and AI researcher. Founding engineer at Kindo, building agent orchestration infrastructure. Writing about AI systems, autonomous organizations, and the craft of engineering.

## About
- [Home](https://charlie.engineer/): Personal site â€” essays, notes, and project writeups
- [Archive](https://charlie.engineer/archive/): All posts by date

## Writing
- [OrgLoop: Organization as Code](https://charlie.engineer/posts/orgloop-organization-as-code/): Open-source runtime for declarative AI agent event routing
- [agentctl: Headless Orchestration for Coding Agents](https://charlie.engineer/posts/agentctl/): CLI that wraps coding agents for headless orchestration and supervision
- [Coding is Creative](https://charlie.engineer/posts/coding-is-creative/): Programming as a creative outlet, compared to traditional artistic pursuit
- [Grand Prize at LA Hacks](https://charlie.engineer/posts/la-hacks-tred/): Winning the largest hackathon in history with a VR treadmill
- [Autonomous Hovercraft](https://charlie.engineer/posts/autonomous-hovercraft/): Award-winning autonomous hovercraft from UMD engineering competition
